hypothesis_content.title: DOGE Weekend Momentum Anomaly During Neutral Regimes
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL market regimes (BTC 20-day volatility 40-60%), DOGE exhibits positive weekend momentum (Friday 20:00 UTC to Sunday 23:00 UTC) with average returns of +8-12%, outperforming BTC and major altcoins, driven by retail trading activity patterns.
hypothesis_content.rationale: DOGE has consistently shown weekend outperformance during range-bound markets, with 68% positive weekend returns in 2024 NEUTRAL regimes. Retail traders allocate more time to speculative trading on weekends, focusing on recognizable memecoins.
entry_conditions: DOGE Friday volume > Wednesday volume (increasing interest)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 8% gain or Sunday 23:00 UTC exit (whichever comes first)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Weekend returns become negative or insignificant over 10 consecutive occurrences, or pattern reverses (weekends underperform weekdays).
